welcome_message_body: Welcome to Old Bridge, where small-town charm meets big-city energy. Known for its historic landmarks, beautiful parks, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic flights and select international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport caters to the needs of private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
